title.rendered: How augmented reality can transform healthcare in the COVID-19 era

<title>Augmented Reality in Healthcare: Applications, COVID-Related Examples, & Deployment Tips — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Enhance your medical practice with augmented reality in healthcare to cope with the pandemic’s demands. AR’s medical applications include augmented reality-assisted surgery and treating mental illnesses. Learn how other healthcare facilities are using AR to fight COVID-19 and check our “getting started” tips." />
